name: Magic Mayhem (CandyDandyMan)
description:
Magic Mayhem

For some reason the project didn't scale correctly so just use full screen ;)

Controls : 

WASD or Arrow Keys

Mouse to aim and shoot

Shoot the chaos orbs to get points!

Made in 1 week for the 6th Brackeys Game Jam!

Everything made by me, except the "icy witch" color palate (below)

https://lospec.com/palette-list/icywitch

Any and all feedback welcome!
